评论详情: It is nice and has a convenient loop on the top under the collar to hang the robe. It is 100% poly, very soft inside, and very warm. There are three belt loops, a large one in the back and double loops on each side so the belt can be worn higher or lower. The xxl fit me and I usually wear an 18 or 2x. Unfortunately mine has a few brown marks in the exterior so I sent it back. But nice robe otherwise.

This robe is a good weight, and fit exactly as promised. The lining is not terrycloth but micro plush, so I don't know how absorbent it is, but it's comfortable after a shower (or sitting around doing other things until I finally get around to showering). I'm very happy with it.

I love this robe!  I received it as a Christmas gift and 1 month in I can say that it was everything I was looking for.  The terry material is super soft and the cotton outer layer is also high quality.  The robe looks and feels exactly like the luxury hotel and spa robes I have worn, and provides that feeling I was looking to replicate at home.  I researched and ultimately selected this one to put on my wish list.  It is fabulous.
Discovered this product at a posh hotel and decided to order one for myself.  Very happy with this purchase.
Runs large but very nice!
This robe is so comfy! Perfectly absorbs water and provides warmth at the same time. Super happy with my purchase! It's expensive, but I use it every day! Ordered the pink color
Just what I wanted. My only regret is not buying this long ago!

I have purchased 6 of these robes, sizes S, M, XL and XXL, for guests and myself in colors white and gray.  The XXL fit with extra room on a 6’3” 260 lbs man, would not have gone with XL for him. XL for a 5’10” 200 lb man - fit loosely. The Medium fit loosely on a 5’4” 140 lb woman. The Small for a 5’4” 110 lb woman, could’ve gone with an XS. The robes are a nice weight and very soft. They arrived fairly wrinkly. After arrival, I washed them and the wrinkles were still there. So, I steamed them, which worked great. After wearing and being washed 2 more times, the wrinkles haven’t come back. Fabric seems to hold up well. Would recommend.
Runs big, even the small is almost too big. But very comfy and cozy.

I went to Macys, three different spas, shopped numerous other stores until I found these. We have a matching set. They are soft inside and out, well sewn  glad I made this choice highly recommend. They are medium weight. Fit well. My partner is an xl and tall. It fits him well. The color is nicer than the picture
This thing is so big the XS we ordered would fit a 7ft man, the outside fabric is not befitting a bathrobe...hard and crass
For a $100 robe, you would think they could at least sew the tag straight. Disappointed already- and this is a gift.
Great quality! Not super thick just great material and very well made. Love it

评论概述: SUPER COZY and Everything you could want in a robe!
评论详情: This is THE PERFECT robe. Size is accurate, color is white, so soft - warm - and comfy. Love the length and just the perfect weight.

I've never had a proper, luxe bathrobe. The last one I bought was a cheapo from Target 25 years ago.  It wasn't great, but I had it until this year, when I purged all the things that don't serve me anymore. This robe is beyond beyond! It is SO LUXURIOUS, and so soft & comfy. If you're on the fence, wondering if it's worth the hundred bucks: IT IS!! Treat yourself. YOU'RE WORTH IT!!

Needed a robe replacement and after reading the reviews I thought I’d give it a try. Good move on my part!!! I love love it. Made very well, I’ll have this for years!  Not 1 issue and I’m picky.  You won’t be disappointed
The towel fabric inside and the cotton outside is not stitched together so it feels incredibly awkward and uncomfortable. Not a fan.
I use these robes in my vacation rental. Everyone loves them. They are plush on the inside and for the most part easy to keep clean.
I have been looking for a soft plush hotel style robe and this is it!! So comfy and warm and soft. Highly recommend this robe to anyone!

This robe is a $100.00 robe.  Expensive...but made to last and last and last.It is smooth on the outside, fuzzy on the inside, heavy, sturdy, comfy, warm...almost like wearing a cozy blanket on a cold winter night.  I have washed this robe dozens of times.  It comes out of the dryer looking like new, without a wrinkle.  The fuzzy inside does not shed.I have bought other robes before...satin, knit, flannel.  But this is the ultimate robe for warmth and quality.  I highly recommend it!
This robe was the best purchase! The quality of the fabric is amazing. It feels so good. I’m so glad I invested in this robe.
It’s like getting a hug!
Worth the money! I'm 5'6 130 pounds and I could literally live in this robe. It washes so easy and is very durable and very soft.
Great

One Christmas, many years ago, I was gifted the most amazing robe. It was luxurious, classy, hung well, and fit perfectly. I finally had to discard it after several years of daily use. This Monarch robe is almost a carbon copy, and I cannot believe that it popped up as a recommended item after I'd finally given up hope of finding something comparable. This robe even has the double belt loops which is wonderful for me since I'm long-waisted. It has a slightly weighted feel and is silky smooth on the outside while having a soft and absorbent layer against the skin.

Funny story: my husband ordered this and one other robe for me as birthday gift. This one is thick and luxurious, feels high quality. But because it is dark gray, it looks a bit more masculine. So….we kept it and he uses it! 😄 Now we both have new robes.

评论概述: This is my second Monarch robe
评论详情: I love this robe. It's luxurious. I had a white one for three years but I painted in it and got paint all over it so it was time for a refreah. This time I purchased a black one for a spa-like feeling. It definitely provides that. Love this brand.
Beautiful fabric, warm, and washes well.
So soft and comfortable. Love it.
The robe looks pretty. The lining of the robe is cheap and is very difficult to put on after a shower. It doesn’t feel like terry cloth at all. I do not recommend this item

I purchased a white one at the Marriott. After awhile it mildewed leaving black stains. I purchased this blue one from Amazon to hide any potential stains. The difference between them is the white one had a terry cloth liner and this one has a microfiber liner. The terry cloth absorbs water much better. This one is more like a very comfortable longing robe…doesn’t absorb water after a shower very well.
Soft, luxurious, spa bathrobe. I usually wear on Sundays as it's too warm for daily wear.
Very high quality Robe.  Soft lining.  Well made.  Worth the premium price.
Love the softness and warmth! The length is great for cold weather when you have to take your dogs out at all times!! Love it!
Cheap, designe and quqlity

评论概述: Revising my review...this robe grows on u.
评论详情: Further update...my favorite robe of all time! Going to buy another just to have when this one wears out. Best part of my day is coming home and slipping into this luxurious robe! Too think I was actually going to return it b4 washing it!  Update...with each washing this robe keeps getting softer and more luxurious. Definitely a 5 star purchase! And to think I actually was going to return it.  This is for all practical purposes a great bathrobe if you live in Seattle and go out in the rain to get your mail. For lounging around the house it is like wearing a fur lined raincoat. Really torn on what to do with this product. It is so comfortable and well made but the exterior shell feels like a raincoat. I guess I will wash it and give it 30 days. I hope washing softens the exterior shell.  This robe is growing on me. Not bad at all. Quite comfortable adding another star to review!. I see it is frequently returned, which i also was gonna do. But try it, it might grow on u!  Ok further revision...washing it does soften the shell. Its like it ships with some kind of stiffener on it. All around good product...moves up to 5 stars. Keeper!
They need to make the pockets warmer. It's not Terry like a towel the rest of it is thick like terry. Still like it, but if the pockets were Terry it would be perfect.
This robe is wonderful.  Quality material and is heavy in weight.  Spa Quality.  I ordered a small (5'6" 120) and it is plenty big enough.
I got this as a gift for a friend and she loved it ! The measurements are accurate- she is normally a small but the XSmall sizing was perfect for her

It’s like being wrapped in the arms the marshmallow man.  It was a large and I wear a medium but TOO COMFORTABLE to return for a smaller size.  I will never get another style robe - it’s that good.  The only reason I purchased this robe is because my large robe was burned in a malfunctioning dryer.  Didn’t shrink when dried before but the dryer I used was running too hot.
This is the best thing I’ve had in years! Love the quality and comfort.
Wonderful robe, spa quality.  Launders well, super soft.  Runs a little on the large size but super happy with it.
I’m so glad I got this
This robe is cozy and soft! I went to a spa that had these robes. I ordered one immediately when I got home.

Hubby received one like this as a wrap gift on a movie executive produced by Oprah! He loves it wears it every day and he needed a replacement. Perfect gift for amy man for any occasion. Soft, plush, pockets, washes great, comfy.

I bought this as a gift for a friend and really want to buy my own. It’s not something someone might think to get themselves but once they do, it’ll enhance their everyday and transform a nightly routine into a more luxury experience which is amazing. It does seem fairly thick and cozy - maybe not the best for hotter months but still luxurious.

I love this robe! It’s one of my favorite purchases I’ve made in a long time. I put it on most nights after a shower and it feels like I’m at a spa. Perfectly comfortable and it fits very well, with a little extra room so I’m not worried about flashing anyone. I am 5’2” and about 125lbs and the XS fits me perfectly.
I purchased this for my daughter.  It feels like a lush robe from a posh hotel.  Quality fabric AND pockets big enough to hold a puppy!  Winner.
Better quality than expected! Perfect for cold plunges. I’m tall but the arm length is perfect. I would size down for a more form fitting robe.

评论概述: Plasticky fabric, doesn’t absorb well, not worth the price
评论详情: I’ve had this robe for months now and it’s just not worth the price tag. When you put it on after showering, the inner lining drags on your skin and doesn’t absorb well. The fabric on the outside is a different material and it slides around from the inner lining because they are only stitched on the edges of the robe. Not luxurious feeling like the other reviews suggest (maybe different batch?) If you’re looking for a regular bath robe, get something way cheaper for similar if not better product; if you’re looking for a luxurious bath robe, look into a different brand.

评论概述: Not the absorbency I was hoping for
评论详情: This is a gorgeous robe but the lining is not what I was expecting, which  was a luxury terry cloth interior.  I had a Luxury Spa robe but it was too heavy as a Large so I ordered the above which is my mistake because I did not see that it was microfiber.  I love the color and the fit but not the lining.  I got periwinkle.

I wasn’t sure I was going to like it as much as the robe I was replacing, however it is very soft on the inside. Very comfy and cozy ! The size, I ordered was medium, but the size runs BIG , it actually swallows me up. Wish I had ordered a small. But , because it is so comfortable the extra comfy is good!
Bought this for my husband and he loves it!!! It’s so warm and comfy.  Plus it gets softer with each wash.  Best purchase and worth every penny
So snuggly and comfortable.  Beautiful!!
This robe was described as being plush and like robes at a spa. It’s cheap looking and flimsy. It looks like something from the Dollar Store
got it for a gift she loves it
I ordered this item for a friend, who was pleased to receive it.
This robe fit well for my wife, she is shorter and many robes are too long.
Nice quality, washes well, looks and wears great!

评论概述: Really really wanted to love this
评论详情: But it was way too large - more fitting for a man even in a ladies small. Small was the smallest size it came in. The pockets were too low, the sleeves too long, the shoulders too large - it was just too large overall. It was also heavier than I wanted. I sent it back.

This robe arrived completely wrinkled. I washed it and dried on low and took it out immediately and it made no difference. I sprayed it with Downy wrinkle release and put it back in the dryer. No luck. then tried the steam cycle on my dryer twice on low and once on medium without any luck. Guess I will have to try ironing it to get it to not look like garbage. Lame.
Use this everyday! 10/10
It’s more expensive than a lot of options on Amazon. But, it’s warm and not bulky. Excellent quality. It was given as a gift and they love it.
oversized and comfy, great for getting in and out of your pool or hot tub on a chilly afternoon
This robe was just as described and was as nice as robes we have from exprnsive hotels.

评论概述: Too narrow in the shoulders for me
评论详情: 2xl too narrow in the shoulders for me. Don't like the internal material sticks to wet skin so it's impossible to put on getting out the hot tub. Would have returned if it wasn't a gift. Hate my mom wasted a hundred dollars on it.

评论概述: Best Luxury robe for summer or winter.
评论详情: Love the robe. It is the 3rd one I have order.
we stayed in a romantic villa and they had these robes for use during our stay.  we enjoyed them so much,  we bought them for home.

I recently stayed at the Fairmont hotel in Chicago and went to their spa for a massage & fell in love with the robe they provided. I quickly checked the label and saw it was a Monarch Cypress robe and immediately bought it when I got back home. For reference, I’m 5’7 and 125 lbs, and the small fits great! It’s a little roomy but that’s what I wanted. Super soft & cozy. I just wish they had the stone color in this style!
This robe is a quality, cozy robe. Very nice.

Exactly like the spa robe we used at Hilton, for half the price.  I am 5’2” and 130 lbs and I bought a small.  Fits perfectly; the length is perfect—almost ankle length.  SUPER soft and cuddly.  If I could wear it to work, I would!
This is the softest, perfect weight, washable robe. Love it!
Fits beautifully so soft and warm yet cool it’s bizarre and I love it! My husband bought me one for Christmas I loved it so much I bought him one for Valentine’s Day ❤️

评论概述: I would like to ship back
评论详情: It’s to large/heavy and my wife don’t want it.
Wife got me this for Xmas. Love it! Great material.
This is a gorgeous robe! The satin and fleece trim feels luxurious on your skin 😊. I bought mine in pink satin and I love it-very cozy after a shower or bath💗

I love this comfortable robe especially on cold mornings.  I wish it was slightly longer but only a very minor complaint. Im 6 feet tall and it falls about an inch below my knees which is usually a great length.  However on those rare days when temps are below zero, I sometimes wish it were closer to my ankles!
Like quality, worth the price.
Total spa robe vibe. Super comfortable, I do wish it was a little smaller but I truly like it nonetheless
I purchased this for my boyfriend and he loves it for lounging and is soft enough to sleep. It's not meant to absorb water for after bathing, but his use was not needed for that.

评论概述: Fits great with a softness next to none and great absorbency
评论详情: wore this robe at a hotel in Cape Cod . Knew I had to have it . Luckily got it for my birthday . This robe is so comfortable and great absorbency . I put it on getting out of the steamer and early mornings . Love this robe !!
Luxury!
It's huge! But so comfortable. I love it! I love spa robes and this one is pretty close.
New hot tub. These robes perfect

The woman I bought this for, wanted a high-quality robe. Those were literally some of the first words that came out of her mouth when she opened it. She likes the terrycloth lining, which is very soft next to her skin, and when she sits on the couch in it, it comes just to her knees. She was very happy with it, which makes me very happy with it. I would like it if the pink were a bit more, vibrant pink, but all in all the fit was as advertised.
This is by far the nicest robe I’ve ever owned.  It’s warm but breathable and ever so soft. Big hit here!!
My husband loves it
My Mother-in-law just loved it!
I love this robe. It is very cozy and warm, soft on the outside and plush on the inside. I have only washed it once, but it washed well.  Caveat: It is very heavy.
Bought as a gift and she can't stop raving about it.  It's heavy and well made, and the pockets are a big plus.
Not cotton inside
This is my third robe in 6 years.  Exactly like the spa robes I get in 5 star resorts and hotels.  Also is a perfect gift for gals !

评论概述: No need to order a larger size, we could use 1 size smaller.  Overall the item is excellent.
评论详情: The bathrobe is excellent.  We could use 1 size smaller, but what we have is ok.  It is on the heavy side, if looking for 1 lighter.  Would buy it again.
Great for lounging, poolside or out of the shower.  So comfortable and have gotten many compliments on the texture and feel.

...but you might question the sizing.  Listen - this luxury bathrobe is well-designed and crafted.  It issoft and has a luxurious feel and appearance.  The only thing missing is the italicized monogram of somefamous 4- or 5-star hotel or resort on the front.  That said, this sucker is long.  I recommend going onesize smaller than you think if you are of average build for your height - otherwise the shoulders andwaist will fit, but you'll have to get the length hemmed up 2 to 4 inches.  I still recommend buying this...it's a great robe.
Very satisfied
Xmas gift for my wife, she was very happy with the construction and fit, very soft and warm! Perfect for trips to the hot tub or for lounging.
I thought it was going to be a soft robe, very disappointed. Not soft at all, very course & rough to the touch, I will probably never wear it, it wasn’t what the picture & wording said .
Super soft exactly what I was looking for.  Excellent quality!
Best purchase! I wear this robe daily. It fits oversized, so definitely size down.
